titleStmt.title: The judgment of an anonymous writer concerning ... I. a law for disabling a papist to inherit the crown, II. the execution of penal laws against Protestant dissenters, III. a bill of comprehension : all briefly discussed in a letter sent from beyond the seas to a dissenter ten years ago.
titleStmt.author: Hickes, George, 1642-1715.
L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.B. for Robert Clavel and are to be sold by Randolph Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by George Hickes. Also ascribed to R. L'Estrange by the Nat. Lib. of Scot. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
